description: T7	x1		Sycamore	Acer pseudoplatanus	Rear garden	"Suggested works:- Remove ivy to height of fence- Remove any substantial dead wood"	T6	x1	 Common Plum	Prunus domestica	Rear garden	"Suggested works:- Remove ivy- Remove dead wood"	T5	x1		False Acacia	Robinia pseudoacacia	Rear garden	"Suggested works:- Lift over road by 2m- Remove ivy to height of fence- Remove any substantial dead wood- Reduce heavy over long branch over road by 2m"	T4	x1	Sycamore	Acer pseudoplatanus	Rear garden	"Suggested works:- Lift over road by 2m- Remove ivy to height of fence- Remove any substantial dead wood"	T3	1	No	Sycamore	Acer pseudoplatanus	Rear	No action necessary	T2	1	No	False Acacia	Robinia pseudoacacia	Rear	"Suggested works:- Lift over road by 1.5m"	T1	1	No	Deodar Cedar	Cedrus deodara	Front	"Large, mature, high value amenity tree. This tree is almost touching the building and it has a dense canopy. To clear the building and to reduce the mechanical loading on the tree,Suggested works are:- To reduce the lateral spread to the North to clear the building by 2m,- Thin through the crown by 10 - 15%, remove deadwood, weak, suppressed and crossing branches- Reduce over long branches over neighbouring property by 1m"
